Title: A Dark Summons
Description:
Denizens of Azeroth,

Do you thirst for power? Do you wish to change your circumstances, to become... more? 

More free.

More respected.

More feared.

Do you wish to become a Warlock?

If your response to any of the above is "yes", then meet with my humble servant Phineas.

In temptation,

Madam Shadow
ObjectivesText: Talk to Assistant Phineas in the Cleft of Shadow in Orgrimmar.
RewardText:
Another taker, but wait! $n? Well now...

... you're just the $c we've been looking for!
